The Prussian Cultural Heritage Foundation confirmed that Parzinger had received a letter from Zahi Hawass , but said that it was not signed by the prime minister and was not an official demand from the Egyptian state. It added that under a 1912 agreement, artefacts found in the dig were properly listed and photographed, showing clearly their`` beauty and quality'', and then divided up between the two sides.

Simon Cowell for Glee character The 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her.`` He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Jane Lynch also admitted she is`` amazed'' by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . She explained in an interview with

gains and greenhouse gas reductions from using a light-duty hydraulic hybrid system.`` Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint,'' Sergio Marchionne said. It has shown substantial increases in fuel economy when compared with traditional powertrains in the same type of vehicles. Both parties hope to reduce the size and complexity of the hybrid system and produce a technology that is sensitive to the needs of drivers for smooth and quiet operation.
